name: Echoes Beneath
description:
The story takes place in the 18th century, where Dr.Okron has established his occult research facility in an old cathedral. Tonight he makes a major breakthrough with his subject - however - simultaneously the building gets struck by lightning, which knocks him unconcious and causes a power failure.

As the player you awaken inside the laboratory after the incident, suffering a severe loss of memory. With nothing but your old journal in hand, you must find a way out. This is no easy task, due to the safety precausions that have been taken to keep the place sealed shut. Can you use what little information you have and outsmart the puzzles?
